titleStmt.title: A discourse of miracles wrought in the Roman Catholick Church, or, A full refutation of Dr. Stillingfleets unjust exceptions against miracles together with a large discovery of the Doctors unexcusable frauds, manifest in his many false, perverted, and impertinent quotations / by E.W.
titleStmt.author: E. W. (Edward Worsley), 1605-1676.

titleStmt.title: A discourse of miracles wrought in the Roman Catholick Church, or, A full refutation of Dr. Stillingfleets unjust exceptions against miracles together with a large discovery of the Doctors unexcusable frauds, manifest in his many false, perverted, and impertinent quotations / by E.W.
titleStmt.author: E. W. (Edward Worsley), 1605-1676.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Worsley. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Title pages stained in filmed copy. Title page-p.1 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
